values: 绳；绳索；缆绳；界绳；绳索；（绞刑用的）绞索；（用绳索串起的）一串；（拳击或摔跤场四周的）围绳
套；用绳子捆（或绑、系）；说服某人加入；用绳（或带子）围栏；操纵；捕捉动物（尤指用套索）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 绳状的；黏稠的，可拉成丝的；强健的
用绳捆；拧成绳状；拉运（rope的ing形式）
制绳者；套绳者；诱人进入赌场者
走钢丝绳索特技表演者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用于捆绑大物件的粗壮而坚固的绳子，一般用绵、毛、麻、金属或其它材料制成。
普通用词，指用棉、毛、丝或纤维等纹成的很细的线，通常用于缝纫、纺织等。
普通用词，指捆绑小件物品的细绳或细带子。
普通用词，含义广泛，指任何一种线，常作引申用。
指比string粗，比rope细，较牢固，通常用于捆扎较小物品的线或绳。用作引申当约束讲。

word_group.brief_definition: 被对手逼到拳击台的围绳上；即将崩溃, 即将完蛋, 就要失败, 处于困境
容易赚的钱；不费吹灰之力的收益
无凝聚力的结合；不牢固的凝聚；徒劳无功的事
拖拽用辅索；拖船安定绳；船尾系艇索

bilingual.source: She secured the tent with a rope.
They used a rope to lift the heavy stone.
bilingual.target: 他们用绳索拉起了沉重的石头。

bilingual.source: The children played a rope game in the park.
bilingual.target: 孩子们在公园里玩绳索游戏。

bilingual.source: He used a rope to tie the box to the roof of the car.
bilingual.target: 他用绳索把箱子绑在车顶上。

bilingual.source: The rescue team used a rope to save the trapped person.
bilingual.target: 救援队用绳索救出了被困的人。

bilingual.source: The fairlead prevents the rope from chafing against the boat's edge.
bilingual.target: 导缆器防止绳索在船边缘磨损。

bilingual.source: The sailor adjusted the fairlead to ensure the rope was properly aligned.
bilingual.target: 水手调整了导缆器，确保绳索对齐。

bilingual.source: Elastic rope is the theoretic model of wire rope.
bilingual.target: 弹性绳是钢丝绳、绳索等的理论模型。

bilingual.source: He whaled the thief with a rope.

yingyinNormal.en: A mask? A bungee rope, a mask, Derren Brown.
yingyinNormal.zh: 面具? 蹦极绳索，人皮面具，达伦布朗。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, then I will make you an arrangement. If you let me buy you a glass of wine, I will never hang my rope anywhere in the Latin Quarter ever again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我帮你安排一下，如果你让我请你喝酒，我就再也不在拉丁广场上走绳索。

yingyinNormal.en: One from this rope, and another from a rope earlier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一道是这根绳子的，另一道是之前勒的。

yingyinNormal.en: Then we pass a larger rope. Then, we attach this larger rope to the steel walk cable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接着是大绳子，将大绳子绑在钢索上。

yingyinNormal.en: Rope off across the staircases and the back wing. Who are the guides?
yingyinNormal.zh: 用绳子把楼梯和后屋都拦上，谁做向导？

yingyinNormal.en: Then, we attach this fishing line to a small rope, and we pass that between the towers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再把钓鱼线绑在一条绳子上，在两座塔楼之间传送。

yingyinNormal.en: But we need to be playing to do it. Of course. Richard, Edmond, bring the extra long skipping rope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我们只有在玩的时候才能做到。噢，没问题。理查德，埃德蒙，去把跳绳用的绳子拿出来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone is pulling so hard the rope is breaking. And the result is a draw. So both teams win. Hooray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有人都努力在拉，结果绳子断了。比赛结果两边平手。你们两队都赢了。好嘞。

yingyinNormal.en: I would tow you, but I haven't got a tow rope. Oh, I have got plenty of them. I do them in packs of five.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以拖你过去，但是我没有拖车绳。哦，拖车绳我有的是，一捆就有五根哦。

yingyinNormal.en: I would tow you, but I haven't got a tow rope. Oh, I have got plenty of them. I do them in packs of five.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以拖你过去，但是我没有拖车绳。哦，拖车绳我有的是，一捆就有五根哦。

yingyinNormal.en: I got a scooter. I got a spaceship. A Little guitar. A toy mouse. A bat and ball. A skipping rope. A trumpet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有滑板车！我得到太空船了！小吉他！玩具老鼠！球连球拍！跳绳！喇叭！

yingyinNormal.en: I like the way you sing. It's very good. You were not listening to me sing. You were playing with fire on a rope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢你的歌声，很悦耳，你没听我唱歌，你在绳子上玩火。

yingyinNormal.en: Boys are against girls. When I say go, you must pull the rope with all your strength. The girls will win. No, they won't. The boys will win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 男女大对抗。听到我说开始以后，你们就使劲拉绳子。女生会赢的。你们不会赢，我们男生会赢。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm letting life hit me until it gets tired. And then I'm gonna hit back. It's a classic "Rope-a-dope". Okay, Ali. I love you. Unpack your boxes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让生活狠狠地打击我，直到它怂了。然后我就反击，这是经典的以逸待劳。行了，阿里，我爱你。快收拾你箱子。

yingyinNormal.en: What have you all asked Father Christmas for? A scooter. A toy spaceship. A Little guitar. A toy mouse. A skipping rope. A trumpet. A bat and ball.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们跟圣诞老人要什么礼物呢？滑板车。玩具太空船。小吉他。玩具老鼠。跳绳。喇叭。球连球拍。

yingyinNormal.en: What have you all asked Father Christmas for? A scooter. A toy spaceship. A Little guitar. A toy mouse. A skipping rope. A trumpet. A bat and ball.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们跟圣诞老人要什么礼物呢？滑板车。玩具太空船。小吉他。玩具老鼠。跳绳。喇叭。球连球拍。

yingyinNormal.en: Suzy wants a scooter. Danny, a spaceship. Pedro, a guitar. Emily, a toy mouse. Zoe, a bat and ball. Candy, a skipping rope. And Rebecca, a trumpet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏西想要滑板。丹尼想要太空船。佩德罗想要吉他。艾米丽想要玩具老鼠。苏怡想要球连球拍。凯迪，跳绳。瑞贝卡，喇叭。

yingyinNormal.en: Danny has found a pine cone. Treasure. Peppa has found a shell. Treasure. Suzy has found an old bit of rope. Treasure. Freddy has found a pebble. Treasure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丹尼发现了一个松果。宝藏。佩奇发现了一个贝壳。宝藏。苏西发现了一截旧的绳子。宝藏。弗莱迪发现了一个鹅卵石。宝藏。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 绳子; 绳索; 捆绑; 系住

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

sense_info_list.en: a strong thick cord of strands (as of fiber or wire) twisted or braided together
sense_info_list.zh: 绳子; 绳索; 捆绑; 系住

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a strong thick cord of strands (as of fiber or wire) twisted or braided together

examination_example.sentence: Just as in a game of tug-of-war, whenever a person is added, everyone else pulls the <highlight>rope</highlight> with less force.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像拔河游戏一样，每当有人加入时，其他人拉绳子的力气就会小一些。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He laid before them seven sticks, which were tied together with a <highlight>rope</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他把七根用绳子捆着的棍子摆在他们面前。

examination_example.sentence: But as he moved the car a little further forward, the <highlight>rope</highlight> broke.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但当他把车往前开一点时，绳子断了。

examination_example.sentence: Skipping <highlight>rope</highlight> makes not only the brain but also the eyes excited.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跳绳不仅使大脑兴奋，而且使眼睛兴奋。
